resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping8",
    roles=[
        "superuser"
    ],
    enabled=True,
    rules={
        "all": [
            {
                "any": [
                    {
                        "field": {
                            "dn": "*,ou=admin,dc=example,dc=com"
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "field": {
                            "username": [
                                "es-admin",
                                "es-system"
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "groups": "cn=people,dc=example,dc=com"
                }
            },
            {
                "except": {
                    "field": {
                        "metadata.terminated_date": None
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)
